readme.overview: The OSIRIS-REx SPICE archive bundle contains observation geometry and other ancillary data in the form of SPICE System kernel files for the OSIRIS-REx spacecraft, its instruments, and targets.
readme.cognisant_authority: This archive bundle was produced by Boris Semenov, Planetary Data System Navigation and Ancillary Information Facility Node, Jet Propulsion Laboratory, Pasadena, California.

kernel.description: SPICE LSK file incorporating leapseconds up to $DATE, created by NAIF, JPL.
SPICE text PCK file containing constants from the $REPORT report, created by NAIF, JPL.
SPICE text PCK file containing constants for asteroid Ryugu, created by Kobe University.
SPICE FK file defining reference frames of the Hayabusa2 spacecraft, its structures, and science instruments, created by ISAS, JAXA.
SPICE FK file defining reference frames of the asteroid 162173 Ryugu, created by ISAS, JAXA.
SPICE FK file defining reference frames of the Hayabusa2 home position, created by ISAS, JAXA.
SPICE IK file providing FOV definitions for the Hayabusa2 Light Detection And Ranging (LIDAR) instrument, created by ISAS, JAXA.
SPICE IK file providing FOV definitions and other instrument parameters for the Hayabusa2 Optical Navigation Camera (ONC) instruments, created by ISAS, JAXAL.
SPICE IK file providing FOV definitions and other instrument parameters for the Hayabusa2 Thermal Infrared Imager (TIR) instrument, created by ISAS, JAXA.
SPICE IK file providing FOV definitions and other instrument parameters for the Hayabusa2 Near Infrared Spectrometer (NIRS3) instrument, created by ISAS, JAXA.
SPICE SCLK file containing time correlation data for the Hayabusa2 on-board clock, created by ISAS, JAXA.
SPICE SPK file containing JPL planetary ephemerides version $VERSION, created by NAIF, JPL.
SPICE SPK file containing ephemerides of 2162173 Ryugu obtained via JPL Horizons.
SPICE SPK file containing ephemerides of 2162173 Ryugu created by JAXA/ISAS orbit group.
SPICE SPK file containing final ephemeris data for the Hayabuas2 spacecraft based on the precise after-the-fact OD solutions, created by ISAS, JAXA.
SPICE SPK file containing final ephemeris data for the Hayabuas2 spacecraft based on the precise after-the-fact OD solutions, created by ISAS, JAXA.
SPICE SPK file containing the final Hayabusa2 ephemeris during approach phase, created by JAXA/ISAS orbit group.
SPICE SPK file containing ephemeris data generated by HPNAV for the Hayabusa2 spacecraft, created by ISAS, JAXA.
SPICE SPK file containing ephemeris data generated by LIDAR team for the Hayabusa2 spacecraft, created by ISAS, JAXA.
SPICE CK file containing the attitude of the Hayabusa2 spacecraft, created by ISAS, JAXA. The original source is the house keeping packet.
SPICE CK file containing the attitude of the Hayabuas2 spacecraft, created by ISAS, JAXA. The original source is the house keeping packet.
SPICE CK file containing the attitude of the Hayabusa2 spacecraft, created by ISAS, JAXA. The original source is the house keeping packet.
SPICE CK file containing the attitude of the Hayabusa2 spacecraft, created by ISAS, JAXA. The original source is the house keeping packet.
SPICE MK file listing kernels for the whole mission, created by ISAS, JAXA.
